item.title: Acer announces new, faster Chromebook
item.dc:creator: Erica Ogg
item.description: We updated our Chromebook guide with a new model from Acer that we look forward to trying out.
item.content:encoded: We updated our Chromebook guide with a new model from Acer that we look forward to trying out.

item.title: Deals: The smaller version of our favorite standing mat, the Imprint CumulusPro, is down to a great low price, $35
item.dc:creator: J.D. Levite
item.description: Best Deals: The smaller version of our favorite standing mat, the Imprint CumulusPro, is down to a great low price, $35 (from $70). [Imprint]
item.content:encoded: Best Deals: The smaller version of our favorite standing mat, the Imprint CumulusPro, is down to a great low price, $35 (from $70). [Imprint]

item.title: Deals: Sony NEX-6 down to $550, lowest price ever
item.dc:creator: J.D. Levite
item.description: Best Deals: Our favorite mirrorless camera under $1000, the Sony NEX-6, has dropped to an all new low price, $550 (from $740). [Amazon]
item.content:encoded: Best Deals: Our favorite mirrorless camera under $1000, the Sony NEX-6, has dropped to an all new low price, $550 (from $740). [Amazon]

item.title: The new, slightly faster MacBook Air is now a little bit cheaper
item.dc:creator: Erica Ogg
item.description: After some internal tweaks to make the MacBook Air a bit faster, Apple has cut the starting price of the 11-inch Air to $900 and the 13-inch to $1,000. It’s still the best laptop for most, and now it costs less.
item.content:encoded: After some internal tweaks to make the MacBook Air a bit faster, Apple has cut the starting price of the 11-inch Air to $900 and the 13-inch to $1,000. It’s still the best laptop for most, and now it costs less.

item.title: The Best microSD Card
item.dc:creator: Kimber Streams
item.description: After eight hours of research and 15 hours of testing, we determined that the 32GB Samsung EVO is the best microSD card for phones and tablets. It has fast sequential and random read/write speeds, the latter of which are important if you’re using this card as additional storage for your mobile device.
item.content:encoded: After eight hours of research and 15 hours of testing, we determined that the 32GB Samsung EVO is the best microSD card for phones and tablets. It has fast sequential and random read/write speeds, the latter of which are important if you’re using this card as additional storage for your mobile device.

item.title: Updated: GPS running watch, Bluetooth speaker, umbrella, and more
item.dc:creator: Erica Ogg
item.description: We added new competition to the GPS running watch guide; our home Bluetooth speaker and exercise headphones guides are now on wait status while we research new picks; and our favorite soundbar and umbrella models are both sold out, so each guide has been updated with a link to the runner-up in our testing.
item.content:encoded: We added new competition to the GPS running watch guide; our home Bluetooth speaker and exercise headphones guides are now on wait status while we research new picks; and our favorite soundbar and umbrella models are both sold out, so each guide has been updated with a link to the runner-up in our testing.

item.title: Deals: The Sony NEX camera lens we first recommend, the Sony 35mm f/1.8 Prime, has matched its lowest price, $398 (from $448)
item.dc:creator: J.D. Levite
item.description: Best Deals: The first lens we recommend for any Sony NEX camera, the Sony 35mm f/1.8 Prime, has matched its lowest price, $398 (from $448). [Amazon]
item.content:encoded: Best Deals: The first lens we recommend for any Sony NEX camera, the Sony 35mm f/1.8 Prime, has matched its lowest price, $398 (from $448). [Amazon]

item.title: Deals: Kindle Paperwhite down to its lowest price again, $99 (from $119)
item.dc:creator: J.D. Levite
item.description: Best Deals: Our favorite ebook reader, the Kindle Paperwhite, is back down to its lowest price, $99 (from $119). [Amazon]
item.content:encoded: Best Deals: Our favorite ebook reader, the Kindle Paperwhite, is back down to its lowest price, $99 (from $119). [Amazon]

item.title: Samsung goes head-to-head with Dropcam Pro
item.dc:creator: Erica Ogg
item.description: While Samsung’s SmartCam HD Pro has many of the same features as our wireless IP camera pick, head-to-head comparisons show that Dropcam Pro is still the best choice.
item.content:encoded: While Samsung’s SmartCam HD Pro has many of the same features as our wireless IP camera pick, head-to-head comparisons show that Dropcam Pro is still the best choice.

item.title: Asus router firmware update
item.dc:creator: Erica Ogg
item.description: The Asus RT-AC56U is no longer our pick for best Wi-Fi router because of severe connectivity issues on its 2.4Ghz band. But if you own it, you should download the latest firmware update as soon as possible. We don’t know if it will fix the 2.4Ghz issues, but we will be testing it to find out.
item.content:encoded: The Asus RT-AC56U is no longer our pick for best Wi-Fi router because of severe connectivity issues on its 2.4Ghz band. But if you own it, you should download the latest firmware update as soon as possible. We don’t know if it will fix the 2.4Ghz issues, but we will be testing it to find out.
